channel.title: Darts on Hi,..
channel.description: Recent content in Darts on Hi,..

item.title: Control Structures Chapter 1
item.description: Control structure are commands, statements, conditions, code blocks that are useful for controlling program flow. In general, the control structure can be divided into 3: selection structure (condition). option structure is a program block or command that functions to select predetermined conditions. Loop structure (looping). loop structure means a program or command block that is executed for statements defined up to certain conditions.

item.title: Hello World
item.description: DartLang is an object-oriented programming language (OOP), a language for general needs (general-purpose programming language_), the language used to create applications (_Mobile_ {IOS and Android}, _Web_ , _Desktop_, _server_ applications, even **IoT** (_Internet of Things_), using a so-called _dart virtual machine_ {application does not need to be compiled first}, **Open Source** is licensed **BSD**, and dart language is a Google production designed by **Lars Bak** and **Kasper Lund** in 2011.
